name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Remote Data Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications tailored to the healthcare and financial sectors. Adept at **real-time job monitoring** and skilled in **data pipeline management** with a strong emphasis on **analytical problem-solving** and **stakeholder engagement**. Proficient in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with expertise in both frontend and backend development utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.

Experienced in deploying **cloud-native systems** on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing **microservices**, and developing **CI/CD pipelines** that enhance system efficiency. Skilled in building **AI/ML-powered platforms** that support predictive analytics and automation, with a solid background in **MLOps**, implementing solutions with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to compliance-driven development aligning with industry standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Recognized for adaptability and effective team collaboration in dynamic environments.

Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.
Promoted **stakeholder engagement** and **team collaboration** by adapting to project requirements and fostering an environment of continuous improvement.
